column4: i rekon xirc tab completion should be related to who posted last.
yeah, i think so.  Im talking to you through it...  Is there a command i can type at the terminal to see which computers i can see on the network?
ignore, i was going to say you are pretty busy, but do you know how i can get it working with windows file/printer sharing.
is easy ubuntu any better then automatix?

on that note, ive heard its a bad idea upgrading with the update manager, and better to do over the command line, is this the case? im not that fussed, if every thing is working, i think ill just leave it, unless there is a big advantage in upgrading.
it's fine to do it through the GUI.
